metadata.Title: CVE-2023-33250 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low.
metadata.Description: The Linux kernel 6.3 has a use-after-free in iopt_unmap_iova_range in drivers/iommu/iommufd/io_pagetable.c.

notes.Note: cascardo> vulnerability requires access to /dev/iommu, which is limited to root

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
